attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New houses are been built that means more students want to come to gpcsc . the school was built for around 800 students to atttend and now there is over a 1000. Lessons are taken place in corridoors and staff offices. Also the head teachers office has been given up by him so that student can have more classroom space.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
